body:
So... ye, you may think that I'm making this thread to talk a bit of bullshit about avicus choice awards. Na, fuck that shit. I'm making this thread to see at which players have the most kills monuments and shit like that. 


Boy with the most kills: Sunaye
Girl with the most kills: assley/Murph_the_rat
Person with the most kills: assley/Murph_the_rat
Person with the most monuments: Mehrp
Boy with the most monuments: Mehrp
Girl with the most monuments: assley/Murph_the_rat
Person with the best KD ratio: FrozenBlaze1
Person with the most ingame time: Murph_the_cat
Person with the most forum posts: DaFrozenBlaze
Person with the most threads: No Idea
Staff with the most ranks: Fouled/Pizza334
Staff with the most given out punishments (Currently Staff): Zeusy
Staff with the most given out punishments (Not-Currently Staff): Emmaye
Staff with the most infractions: UnitedPingdom/Spoookeh
Person with the most infractions: rainbowpanda901
Staff who has been the longest Staff member (funkystudios does not count): No idea
Team with the most tournament wins: Team Allah
The oldest active team: Cacalmarin
The biggest team in player wise (Competitive): Heartless
The biggest team in player wise (Non-Competitive): Grapes Crew
Longest streak of winning matches: Bad Company (74)
User(s) with the win of every single tournament: Loo, Hete and Stimulating.
Most maps released to public by 1 user: hugWulf/ParaSpider
Most famous avicus youtuber (Inactive):  TheRockmanGamer
Most famous avicus youtuber (Active): MLGPorky




COMMENT DOWN BELOW MORE RECORDS OF AVICUS PLAYERS AND I'LL ADD THEM. PLEASE ALSO HELP ME FINISH ALL THE CURRENT QUESTIONS:

Staff update the thread if you'd like


OH AND IF IM WRONG PLEASE CORRECT ME

replies.body:
Person who has donated to the server the most? From my knowledge, me with a total of $233 ;]

Count:
$100 for my Diamond rank
$50 for Porky's Emerald rank
$50 for the two old giveaways that I had done
$30 for the two new giveaways that I had done
$3 for 5 alpha keys that I purchased

Don't quote me on it 100% and anyone can come and change it, but up to now, I know I donated the most xd

replies.body:
Bad Company holds the record for the longest competitive (scrims and tourney) winning streak at 74 which was ended by Team Allah.

Stimulating, Hete and I have won all the tournaments (3).

The oldest active team is Cacalmarin, not Team Allah.
replies.body_tagged:
Bad Company holds the record for the longest competitive (scrims and tourney) winning streak at 74 which was ended by Team Allah.

Stimulating, Hete and I have won all the tournaments (3).

The oldest active team is Cacalmarin, not Team Allah.
